name: fullstack-master-repo
description: Full-stack master repository with shared packages, backend, web, and mobile applications

scripts.build:backend: yarn build:shared && cd backend && yarn build
scripts.build:web: yarn build:shared && cd web && yarn build
scripts.build:all: yarn build:shared && cd backend && yarn build && cd ../web && yarn build
scripts.build:backend:prod: cd shared && yarn install && yarn build && cd ../backend && yarn install && yarn build
scripts.dev: yarn build:shared && concurrently "yarn dev:shared" "yarn dev:backend" "yarn dev:web"
scripts.install:all: cd backend && yarn install && cd ../web && yarn install && cd ../mobile && yarn install
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && cd shared && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../backend && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../web && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../mobile && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.lint: cd backend && yarn lint && cd ../web && yarn lint

author: Shahadot Hossain
